channel.title: Npc talking
channel.description:
Hello, i need some help here i wanna make my npc talking here is what i mean.
NPC ID == 291
I wanna make it talk, like " Hello, Can you pleae help me" then you click -> Click here to continue. and so " Yes or no " if yes " Okay grate, i need 50 Feathers, talk to me then your done." and if no "Okay, have a nice day".
Do any know how to add that ?
